description.plain: This track is an a capella take on “Run the World (Girls)”, “Where Them Girls At?”, “We Belong” and “Flashlight”, sung by the Barden Bellas at the World Championships.

(We belong)

(We belong)

songs.full_title: Kennedy Center Performance by The Barden Bellas
songs.title: Kennedy Center Performance

description.plain:
This song is an A capella mix of “We Got the World” by Icona Pop, “Timber” by Pitbull ft. Ke$ha, “America the Beautiful” by Katharine Lee Bates and “Wrecking Ball” by Miley Cyrus

It features in the movie Pitch Perfect 2, where the Barden Bellas perform for President Barack Obama.

It features in the movie Pitch Perfect 2, where the Barden Bellas perform for President Barack Obama.

songs.lyrics:
6 ContributorsKennedy Center Performance Lyrics[Verse 1]
They say you're a freak when we're having fun
They say you must be high when we're spreading love
We're just living life and we never stop
We got the world
We got the world world world world world
World world world world world
World world world world world

[Chorus]
It's going down, I'm yelling timber
You better move, you better dance
Let's make a night you won't remember
I'll be the one you won't forget
[Bridge]
Woah, woah, woah
Woah, woah, woah

[Verse 2]
The bigger they are, the harder they fall
These bigiddy boys are diggidy dogs
I have 'em like Miley Cyrus, clothes off
Twerking in their bras and thongs, timber
Face down, booty up, timber
That's the way we like to what?
Timber
I'm slicker than an oil spill
She say she won't, but I bet she will, timber

[Interlude]
They say you're freak!
Woah
Woah
Woah
Woah
From sea to shining sea

[Chorus]
I came in like a wrecking ball
I never hit so hard in love
All I wanted was to break your walls
All you ever did was wreck me
You might also likeI came in like a wrecking ball
Yeah, I just closed my eyes and swung
Left me crouching in a blaze and fall
All you ever did was wreck me
Yeah, you, you wrecked me4Embed

songs.lyrics:
13 ContributorsBack To Basics Lyrics[Verse 1]
He was a famous trumpet man from out Chicago way
He had a boogie style that no one else could play
He was the top man at his craft
But then his number came up and he was gone with the draft
He's in the army now. He's blowing reveille
He's the boogie woogie bugle boy of Company B

[Verse 2]
Oh, you can't hurry love
No, you just have to wait
She said, love don't come easy
It's a game of give and take
[Pre-Chorus]
Hey sister, go sister, soul sister, flow sister

[Chorus]
Giuchie, giuchie, ya ya da da (hey hey hey)
Giuchie, giuchi, ya ya here
Mocha Chocalata ya ya
Creole lady Marmalade

[Bridge]
And now it's time for a breakdown

[Outro]
Never gonna get it, never gonna get it
Never gonna get it, never gonna get it
Never gonna get it, never gonna get it
Never gonna get it, never gonna get it
Oh
Never gonna get it, never gonna get it
Never gonna get it, never gonna get it
Never gonna get it, never gonna get it
Never gonna get it, never gonna get it
Never get itYou might also like2Embed
